__e: This head of mine, and now, as you see I am a beggar, and now that we're having this conversation, would you happen to have a small coin, for the love of God?
I can't locate him. I thought perhaps you might give me some idea.
Do you have any idea who could've done this?
Excuse me. Would you be so good as to point out for me the international boundary?
If you know something to suggest my fortunes have taken a turn for the worse, perhaps you'd be kind enough to share it with me.
Anna... will you kindly go upstairs and help in the dining room?
You willing to lay their lives on the line?
Perhaps you would be so kind... as to help me find the owner of this... rather remarkable shoe?
Would you care to explain what you're doing in my home?
If it's all the same with you, do you have a cordless phone?
Would you... have some place where I could do it?
Do you have a hidden talent I'm unaware of?
Is it possible that someone or something could have affected you without your knowing?
How could you give me something you do not?
- So... so how could you have got here from London to help with the postmortem if you would have had to leave when he was still alive?
Excuse me Father, did you see two girls pass by?
Tell me please, have two men with a small boy passed here?
Have you seen a mom and a dad without me?
What would you have done to her if I didn't stop you?
Now, if it was nothing to hide, why would you have done that?
Else why have you slept apart all this time?
